title: View armor when you're not in-game.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Not currently, no. It’s something I’d like to implement someday, but there are some major technical blockers to fix before it’s possible.

comments.author: figuren.7582
comments.body:
This game needs some tool that works like the in-game wardrobe, except you don’t need to be in-game. A way to try out gear-pieces and build an armor set. Is there anything like that avaible?

Also, I’m not too sure if I posted this in the right section.
